welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Elk Grove Village, where small town charm meets big city opportunities! Known for its vibrant community and beautiful parks, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport with free access for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport is where all international flights depart and arrive.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Midway Airport, primarily used by Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights and offers luxurious amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
